name: Universal Naming Conventions
description: Enforces safe, portable identifier naming across all languages and tools. Based on universal naming rule from general-principles.md
author: Promptcraft

rules.message: Identifiers (variables, parameters, function names) must use only alphanumeric characters and underscores, starting with a letter. Never use hyphens, dots, or spaces. Valid: deployment_name, userId, max_retry_count. Invalid: deployment-name, user.id, max retries
TypeScript/JavaScript variables and functions should use camelCase
Classes and types should use PascalCase
Python variables and functions should use snake_case
